Language.Text:
You can run!
..?
But you can’t hide!
Heeelp!

It is time to master the movements of your character. It is possible to hold multiple directional arrows. You therefore have to press the arrow of a new direction ahead of time, far before the turn. Don't release the original arrow, otherwise you'll stop. The character will turn at the corner, because it will go in the direction that you pressed last. Once it makes the turn, you can release the old direction, hold current and press new, for a new corner.
